question.qText: Which of the following is the MOST likely reason why Germany did not have as large an empire in Africa as did Britain and France?

aBtn.aText: Britain and France created an alliance against German expansion.
Germany had recently unified and came late into imperialistic activities.
Germany did not have the technological capabilities of either Britain or France.
Germany had little interest in colonizing Africa.
Germany did not have a capitalist economy whereas Britain and France did.
